attributes.action: Give the NHS stuff 12.5% pay rise
attributes.background: It is embarrassing that the Government can only spare 1% pay rise for the people who kept the WHOLE country going during the pandemic. If it weren’t for the NHS the vaccine programme which the Government is so proud of and relies on to restart the whole economy, would not have happened!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151
